name: A Matter of Revolutions
description: @ArtPunkDude | A Cycle of Power, beginning and ending with the innate animal need to evolve. Yet, as with evolution, the struggle of power is often one of greed and spite. Not a fight for survival, but a fight for the retention of comfort, safety and epicureanism at the cost of any (and all) considered as other.  Will we ever overcome these fallacies? Only our actions in this time might change the space of tomorrow. #BlackLivesMatter
